title: Sun Transit in the 7th House for Scorpio Ascendant
summary: When the Sun transits the 7th house for Scorpio Ascendant, partnerships, public dealings, and authority dynamics come into focus. This phase highlights visibility through alliances, clients, or one-to-one interactions. You may seek control or recognition in relationships, which can strengthen leadership but also trigger ego clashes. Business partnerships demand clarity and balance. When authority is exercised with respect, this transit supports strong negotiations, public presence, and mutually beneficial agreements.

sections.title: Partnerships
points: Desire to lead or dominate partnerships
Need for clear roles and boundaries

closing: This Sun transit tests relationship maturity for Scorpio Ascendants. Leadership succeeds when authority is balanced with partnership.
